short_summary: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires services to support the development and implementation of this new system for the Office of Energy Efficiency (OEE), as well as expertise to continue to streamline and improve the system post launch.
description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires services to support the development and implementation of this new system for the Office of Energy Efficiency (OEE), as well as expertise to continue to streamline and improve the system post launch.
